scope.title: Next.js :  Adding Storybook
scope.author: Shashank Rawat
scope.summary: Storybook is a tool for UI development. It makes development faster and easier by isolating components. This allows you to work on one component at a time. You can develop entire UIs without needing to start up a complex dev stack, force certain data into your database, or navigate around your application.

prev.title: Intro to Next.js
prev.author: Shashank Rawat
prev.summary: Next.js is an open-source React front-end development web framework created by Vercel that enables functionality such as server-side rendering and generating static websites for React based web applications.
